author: Charlie Campbell / Shanghai
title: ‘How Can I Get Through This?’ The Impact of Coronavirus on China’s Economy Is Only Just Beginning
description: As the world’s number two economy and biggest trading nation, what happens in China is key—and the outlook is grim.
content: Last year, Bi Chao made an investment that he thought would ensure a comfortable living. He plowed 200,000 renminbi (about $28,000) into buying hundreds of exotic animals—chiefly bamboo rats and porcupines. He planned to breed them on his farm in southwestern… [+6418 chars]
